RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARESS coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, dug in under late threat and held safe coming out slightly nearing the finish. CANDY LOVER stumbled at the start, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick latching on the leader as she hit the wire. BENTO broke out at the start coming together with BEFORE YOU GO GO and forcing PLAY GOOD PAY GOOD to steady in between and behind, showed the way in hand three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just outside the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the show honors. BEFORE YOU GO GO broke in at the start brushing with the aforementioned foe and forcing PLAY GOOD PAY GOOD to steady between, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down angled five wide into upper stretch, then weakened in the late stages. TRUE MYTH chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, improved position passing tired rivals. EXPERIMENTAL chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four then three wide into upper stretch and offered no response. PLAY GOOD PAY GOOD got pinched at the start and was forced to steady when rivals on each side broke her way, conceded three to four lengths to the front before settling into stride chasing four to five paths off the inside early on, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: True Myth
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Schoenfeld Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Caress
ENTRY.OWNER: Black Type Thoroughbreds Swinbank Stables Adkisson Steve and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, ins turn, 3w upper, up 1/8p, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Experimental
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4-3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Bento
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand 3-4w, 2p turn, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Play Good Pay Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched, steadied st, 4-5w early, 3-2w turn, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Before You Go Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in st, chased 4-3w, set down 5w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 37000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHASING DAYLIGHT coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide, tucked inside briefly midway on the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding well to the finish kept to task. SHIGEKO hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home while along clear for the place honors. SHOOPTHEREITIS chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, weakened in the late stages. JOEY THE FISH got away to an sluggish beginning, chased four then three wide detached at the tail of the field, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and improved position through to the finish. K D KAKES broke out at the start, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened. JOEYBIGNOSE shied out at the start in reaction to K D KAKES who broke outwards to her inside, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing Daylight
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 3-2w, to ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Joey the Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: sluggish st, chased 4-3w, 2p turn, 7w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Shigeko
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and SOK Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, ins turn, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Shoopthereitis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: K D Kakes
ENTRY.OWNER: Nentwig Michael Rochfort John McLean Ian and Pagano Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 5-6w backstretch, coaxed 3w 7/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Joeybignose
ENTRY.OWNER: The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc and Rahal Robert F
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 3/8M Turf CR: 92. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Quarter on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIBRETTO (IRE) coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside patiently handled until set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, drew off under a drive to the eighth pole, held well and safe to the finish to prevail. TAWARET broke out at the start, raced three wide through the first turn before settling to save ground near the rear of the field, remained on hold and patiently handled until placed to coaxing near the quarter pole, angled five wide into upper stretch, closed well through the final furlong to secure the place honors clear of the rest. DARK POOL just off the inside just off the pace early on, tucked to the rail past the stands for the initial time and tracked along the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. ANNA LUCIA coaxed from the gate, tracked the leader in closest aim while just off the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and stayed on one paced through to the finish. STARTS NOW tracked the pace along the inside, cut the corner roused into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and weakened in the late stages. ABSOLUTE CONTROL (FR) saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, got steadied off the heels of WHY WASTE WORDS with five-sixteenths to go, remained inside to spin just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no rally. NAA DUDETTE three to four wide through the first turn, chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered no response. MACHIAVELLIQUE two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. WHY WASTE WORDS got steadied off the heels of a rival with nine and a half furlongs to go while along the rail, saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. ADDRESSABLE MARKET (IRE) two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. Please note the final time as well as all splits were hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Absolute Control (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd mid pack, steady 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Starts Now
ENTRY.OWNER: Bloom Racing Stable LLC (Jeffrey Bloom) America's Pastime Stables and Krakow Rac
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, cut corner roused, dug in, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Why Waste Words
ENTRY.OWNER: Six Column Stables LLC Bloch Randall L Seiler John Hall David and Nafzger Wanda
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady 9 1/2, saved grd mid pack, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tawaret
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, saved grd near rear, 5w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Machiavellique
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Libretto (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, roused ins 1/4, drew off, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Addressable Market (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Anna Lucia
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Pool
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Naa Dudette
ENTRY.OWNER: Falcone Jr Robert N and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w 1st turn, tracked 4-2w, 5w upper, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BERLONE established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got let out spinning two to three wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive to prevail. BARGAINING POWER broke out at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while keeping on to secure the place honors. DUKE OF GLOUCESTER broke out at the start bumping LOUIE'S HEAT into MOTIVO, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. LITTLE SKIPPY chased three then two wide, got set down angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. MOTIVO got bumped at the start by LOUIE'S HEAT due to pressure from DUKE OF GLOUCESTER, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. GOLDEN PURCHASE broke out at the start, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. LOUIE'S HEAT got bumped at the start by DUKE OF GLOCESTER and in turn bumped MOTIVO, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Purchase
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Berlone
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, let out 2-3w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Little Skippy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, set down angled 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Bargaining Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, no match, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Gloucester
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Louie's Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Motivo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 48000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare A ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO THIRTY FIVE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, continued in the two path into upper stretch and was roused at the three-sixteenths, held clear to the finish kept busy to the end. DURKIN'S CALL chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home while along safe for the place honors. COOL QUARTET chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. DATESFREEDOM chased four wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, tipped six wide into upper stretch, offered no response. HANG TIGHT chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. PIT BOSS coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and tired. LIFE AND LIGHT coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, tired. CAERUS coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coaxed along with seven-sixteenths to run, went five to six wide into upper stretch and just trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Life and Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pit Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 4-5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Quartet
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, angled 4-5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Caerus
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w uppr, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Datesfreedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Durkin's Call
ENTRY.OWNER: Grab Gary and Chief Big Blue Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Two Thirty Five
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, 2w 1/4p, roused 3/16, held clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOLO'S FURY coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, took over command inside the three-sixteenths and edged away under a drive to prevail. SLAMMIN GOLD coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, got collared inside the three-sixteenths and ran on willingly to secure the place honors. SIX FORTYFIVE broke in at the start, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. BRICK AMBUSH chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. HAIR ON FIRE coaxed from the gate, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide for home, weakened in the stretch. BLUE MARBLE chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the turn, went four wide into upper stretch and weakened. CURLIN'S HUSTLE chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. JEFFERSONS OCEAN chased three wide until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and made no impact. GOD LAUGHS chased five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, proved no factor. WINWOOD broke in at the start, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, folded and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Slammin Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, collared, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Brick Ambush
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Jeffersons Ocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Winwood
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, folded, eased home

ENTRY.OWNER: Greyhound Stables and Dunn Christopher T
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, 3w upper, up ins 3/16, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Curlin's Hustle
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: God Laughs
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 7-8w upper, no factor

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Marble
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 3-2w turn, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6F Outer turf CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KING JAMES three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch, closed well through the final furlong and was just up by a sliver on the wire. CHARGING showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and was nailed in the very last jump to the finish. WAR TERMINATOR chased along the inside, struck the temporary fence near the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors. VOLKERT chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on under a drive but was outfinished in the late stages. BUCKORTWO chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. SAINTHOODFORBRIAN broke out brushing the off side stall at the start, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. OCTOPUS coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. MAJESTIC JOHNSON coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, tired. BUILT TO LAST chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, tired. Please note OCTOPUS ran for purse money only.

ENTRY.NAME: Octopus
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: War Terminator
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, hit rail 7/16, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Buckortwo
ENTRY.OWNER: J and N Stables and Diamond M Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Charging
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, edged away, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Sainthoodforbrian
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: King James
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, closed well, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Volkert
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, kept on, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Johnson
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Built to Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000. Three Year Olds, 1 20 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PORTAGE coaxed from the gate, dueled from the two path with FANCY AZTECA to the inside, took over sole command at the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to the finish. TONED UP chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, closed well to secure the place honors. CUPID'S HEART chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, had SWEET MYSTERY attempt to nudge her outwards and denied the move holding her rightful lane at the three-sixteenths, then offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. MONGOLIAN PANTHER chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. SWEET MYSTERY stumbled at the start, came under coaxing and chased two to three wide down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, attempted to lean and nudge out CUPID'S HEART near the three-sixteenths and was denied the move and then bumped the back of that rival before tipping out behind her and offered no kick. FANCY AZTECA coaxed from the gate, dueled inside of PORTAGE from the get go coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. SA FORADADA three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. MIA BEA STAR chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, made no impact. PURE PAULINE broke out at the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, faltered and was eased home to the finish. There was a Jockey's Objection by the rider of SWEET MYSTERY alleging interference against CUPID'S HEART in upper stretch which was reviewed and dismissed prior to the result standing and the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Azteca
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Casal Jorge Kahn Alan and Carney Christopher L
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Pure Pauline
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 7-8w upper, eased

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mystery
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 4w 3/8, 5w uppr, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mongolian Panther
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Portage
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 2p, up 5/16, 3w upper, edged away, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Sa Foradada
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Bea Star

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VINCE THE PRINCE veered in at the start forcing TESTA DURA to steady off his heels and then bumped YOUR MISSION, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding well to the finish kept to task. CATTANI shied in at the start filling the space left vacant by the aforementioned foe, tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide for home, dug in under a drive running on willingly to secure the place honors. JUST FOR LUCK three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. YOUR MISSION got bumped at the start by VINCE THE PRINCE, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. CASH BAIL chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. SILENT RUNNING chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then got outfinished in the late going. WAFLR just off the inside tracking from mid pack, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. HARI three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs out, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. ENGLISH STORM just off the inside tracking the leader in closest aim, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, tipped three wide into upper stretch and tired. TESTA DURA got forced to steady at the start when VINCE THE PRINCE veered directly in front and bumped YOUR MISSION, chased along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Running
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, bid, outfinished
